page.title: 13HYDRO ELECTRICITY-TEANASSIE
page.content: The main reason why there are many dams in our area is that the land is so mountainous.The clouds are forced to rise over the mountains and the air cools down and rain falls.The water is allowed through the dams and it powers turbines which drive generators to make electricity.Two children have fathers who work at the dams.There are 6 dams on the Rivers Glass and Beauly.Hydro Electricity is useful because it is one of the cheapest kinds of electricity to make. AIGAS DAM-Aigas Dam on the River Beauly is well known for its fish pass which is open to the public.You can clearly see male and female salmon going through the pass.The young salmon are about 7cm long,they are called parr.After about 2 years the parr are about 15cm long-they are called smolts.
